subject: Horse Racing
organizations: Travers Stakes at Saratoga Race Course
lead_paragraph: Colonel John edged Mambo in Seattle in a photo finish to win the $1 million Travers Stakes at Saratoga Race Course in Saratoga Springs, N.Y. Colonel John, ridden by Garrett Gomez and trained by Eoin Harty, ran the mile and a quarter in 2 minutes 3.20 seconds and earned $600,000 for WinStar Farm. He paid $10.40 on a $2 bet to win.
